thread.title: 'Big data' predictions spur detentions in China's Xinjiang

title: 'Big data' predictions spur detentions in China's Xinjiang
text:
'Big data' predictions spur detentions in China's Xinjiang Thursday, March 01, 2018 - 01:43 
Chinese authorities in the far western region of Xinjiang are detaining suspects flagged by predictive software that combines data on everything from security camera footage to health and banking records, according to Human Rights Watch.   
Chinese authorities in the far western region of Xinjiang are detaining suspects flagged by predictive software that combines data on everything from security camera footage to health and banking records, according to Human Rights Watch.  //reut.rs/2HTOguc
